thread.title: Google’s Super Bowl Ad Sets Off Google Homes Nationwide
thread.title_full: Google’s Super Bowl Ad Sets Off Google Homes Nationwide

author: spearmankahron@gmail.com (Kahron Spearman)
title: Google’s Super Bowl Ad Sets Off Google Homes Nationwide
text:
Oops. 
It appears Google ’s Super Bowl advertisement set off a host of Google Home units. 
In the commercial, which was out prior to today’s game, different scenarios are shown, with users saying “Okay, Google,” which causes them to light up. However, it seems to have simultaneously activated numerous units, all over the country. That Google Home commercial had my Google Home going crazy. #thanksgoogle #SuperBowl — Nicole Littletaylor (@nlittletaylor) February 5, 2017 The Google Home commercial turned on my Google Home. She's the only person in my house who listens to me. — Dave Matter (@Dave_Matter) February 5, 2017 An accurate assessment and report card on the commercials so far: Inclusive Coca-Cola spotRainbow flag in Google Home adAvocados from Mexico — Music Fan Person (@saveitnerds_) February 5, 2017
